mapper.insert:
insert into loan_detail (month_id, year_num, business_loan_amount, reserved_loan_amount, business_equal_interest_rate, business_equal_interest_principal, business_equal_interest_interest, business_equal_interest_total, business_equal_principal_rate, business_equal_principal_principal, business_equal_principal_interest, business_equal_principal_total, reserved_equal_interest_rate, reserved_equal_interest_principal, reserved_equal_interest_interest, reserved_equal_interest_total, reserved_equal_principal_rate, reserved_equal_principal_principal, reserved_equal_principal_interest, reserved_equal_principal_total) values
(#{detail.monthId}, #{detail.yearNum}, #{detail.businessLoanAmount}, #{detail.reservedLoanAmount}, #{detail.businessEqualInterestRate}, #{detail.businessEqualInterestPrincipal}, #{detail.businessEqualInterestInterest}, #{detail.businessEqualInterestTotal}, #{detail.businessEqualPrincipalRate}, #{detail.businessEqualPrincipalPrincipal}, #{detail.businessEqualPrincipalInterest}, #{detail.businessEqualPrincipalTotal}, #{detail.reservedEqualInterestRate}, #{detail.reservedEqualInterestPrincipal}, #{detail.reservedEqualInterestInterest}, #{detail.reservedEqualInterestTotal}, #{detail.reservedEqualPrincipalRate}, #{detail.reservedEqualPrincipalPrincipal}, #{detail.reservedEqualPrincipalInterest}, #{detail.reservedEqualPrincipalTotal})
